author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia's Ministry of Defence plans evacuations from Syria's Ghouta: agencies
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russia’s Ministry of Defence said on Monday that the Syrian army will suspend strikes on the rebel-held enclave of eastern Ghouta during a daily five-hour truce, introduced from Tuesday, Interfax news agency said.
Militants in the enclave are holding hundreds hostage, including women and children, RIA news agency Quote: d the head of Russia’s monitoring center in Syria, Major-General Yuri Yevtushenko, as saying.
The center, together with the Syrian government, will be evacuating the sick and injured from the area, RIA cited him as saying.
Writing by Polina Ivanova; Editing by Catherine Evans
